page.title: 14Playground Games
page.content: Marbles is a game with tiny balls made of glass or clay. There are different kinds like chinas, oilies, clears, pearls and clays. One game we play is called "Chinese Bombers" in which you take one step and drop your marbles on your opponent's. If you hit you win the marble. "Friendsies" is when you play not to win but to play for the fun of it. When you play in the playground it goes in different directions because there are too many bumps. So we play indoor on the smooth carpet by the notice boards in our classroom. Stuck in the Mud. This can be played by any number of people. Someone is "It". He or she chases after another person until they are tigged. They then stand in a shape until someone rescues them by crawling through their legs. They can then rejoin the game.
